title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.2 - Required fidelity bond
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.2 - Required fidelity bond

State Regulations

No person shall be eligible for approval to sign checks for
an applicant-borrower unless he applies for approval from the fund to sign
checks on behalf of the applicant-borrower and has furnished or presents
satisfactory evidence that he is able and will furnish and appropriate fidelity
bond which names the fund as the obligee or as a co-obligee in an amount
approved by the fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1002.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
